page.description: Gets a list of the roles to which the user belongs.
page.syntax: Context.Security.GetUserRoles as C (UserName as C = null_value())

argument.name: C
argument.description: Return type, a crlf delimited list of roles.

page.discussion: Context.Security.GetUserRoles() gets a list of the roles to which the user belongs. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
